message: /* Recent editing */ Reply
/* Demographics */  Added relevance by citing what Liberty County Sheriff said on camera on a documentary called "The Real Story of Colony Ridge" regarding the demographic in the area.
Bolded the reasons for the DOJ and CFPB sued Colony Ridge

Colony Ridge sells under the name Colony Ridge Development LLC. When they purchase back the lots they foreclose on, they do it under the name Colony Ridge Land LLC. They resell to new buyers under the name of Colony Ridge Development LLC, as evidenced in the Liberty County Apprasal District Website. https://esearch.libertycad.com/
/* Recent editing */
/* Recent NPOV editing */ Reply
Added additional names of company and needed diverse sources of information.

Undid revision 1203841042 by [[Special:Contributions/WikiDan61|WikiDan61]] ([[User talk:WikiDan61|talk]]) The information is neutral, but this apparently paid editor keeps changing it.

Undid revision 1203237931 by [[Special:Contributions/WikiDan61|WikiDan61]] ([[User talk:WikiDan61|talk]]) The last editor removed important information about lending practices. I added some of that back but edited. I hope this is not a person being paid to scrub information. That goes against what Wikipedia stands for. I added a source by the Houston Chronicle.
Previous editor is removing too neutral much relevant information. Also Texas Monthly cited 6 times. Not neutral. Needs to be addressed.
Fix citation errors
